plot: After a woman meets the man of her dreams, all is turned upside down when her parents do not approve. A medical emergency forces the family back together and ultimately reveals the superficial reason for the parents' disapproval.
title: Soles
plot_es: After a woman meets the man of her dreams, all is turned upside down when her parents do not approve. A medical emergency forces the family back together and ultimately reveals the superficial reason for the parents' disapproval.
